content: as a homage to the halloween of 2020 spent indoors with the safety of family and friends here is a set of beginner-friendly fresno nightcrawlers to celebrate the pattern is one document with instructions to complete both the papa and baby nightcrawler they measure at about 6 inches and 3 5 inches from head to foot when using the suggested yarn weight and hook size respectively it requires the usual tools for amigurumi projects however safety eyes may be substituted for embroidery thread as you prefer stay safe stay creepy
